select t_access.*, create_user.username as createBy, update_user.username as updateBy from sys_access t_access left join sys_user create_user on create_user.business_id = t_access.create_by left join sys_user update_user on update_user.business_id = t_access.update_by where t_access.del_flag = 0
and ( t_access.name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or t_access.code like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
order by t_access.create_time desc
